title: Now we have met in Jesus' name
author: William Cowper

verses.text:
Now we have met in Jesus' name,
To glorify our Lord we aim;
We serve each other in his will,
With anxious thoughts to do his will.

We've met in love and holy fear,
To hear the happy sound declare
The rich compassion of a Godâ€”
The virtues of a Saviour's blood.

O Saviour, help them to express
The wonders of triumphant grace,
While to the mourner they freely own
What for their souls the Lord hath done.
